title: Making an account in NA
body: So I went to the league of legends signup and made sure it was set to NA. After I typed all my info in and clicked "Signup" or "Create" or whatever it says, it goes to "Loading..." for a couple of seconds then goes back to "Signup" or whatever. I used 2 different browsers and I cleared cookies. I am new to the whole boards thing so sorry if this is in the wrong area!

replies.body: If I understand correctly, you're signing up for an account but nothing happens- not even an error.  This can happen for a few reasons, the biggest one being that you've selected a birth date that doesn't meet the age requirement for the game.  Beyond that, your email or username might already be in use.  Let me know if that clears things up!
I made a new email for this account, still didnt work. I changed the birth date to something that I knew would work, still wouldn't work. I switched the username a bit and still wouldn't work.
Strange!  This could be some kind of block specifically with your network.  Would you be able to try signing up through a different network setup?
Sorry could you clarify? Do you mean my browser or what?
Here's a video to show exactly what I mean. [](https://vid.me/QTqW)

We noticed that you don't have a captcha loading, the little box that says "I'm not a robot!"  Disable any extensions or run your browser in incognito, as you might have something blocking the captcha from loading.  That is likely why nothing happens when you select sign-up!

Thank's for the video.  By different network, I mean using another internet provider outside of what you're currently connected to.  This could even be your phone if you have a data plan.  Regarding the birthdate adjustment, if this was the case then signup can fail after multiple attempts.
